desc: Sue Phillips, Fragrance Innovator, Scentrepreneur™, Author of "The Power of Perfume" is a recognized industry fragrance expert and has created iconic fragrances for global companies e.g. Tiffany, Burberry, Lancôme, Lancaster, and more. Sue have helped Anosmia sufferers to regain and rediscover their Sense of Smell.

layout.text: THE DESTINATION TO CREATE YOUR CUSTOM FRAGRANCE
